tasks.all: deno fmt && deno lint && deno task check && deno task readme && deno task test
tasks.all-reload: deno fmt && deno lint && deno task check --reload && deno task test --reload
tasks.check: sh -xc '$(command -v fd || command -v fdfind) '"'"'\.(mj|j|t)sx?$'"'"' --hidden --exec deno check --unstable {}'
tasks.udd: sh -xc 'deno run --unstable --allow-read=. --allow-write=. --allow-net --allow-run=deno https://deno.land/x/udd@0.8.2/main.ts --test "deno task all" $($(command -v fd || command -v fdfind) '"'"'(\.(mj|j|t)sx?|^deno.jsonc?)$'"'"')'
